an5.172:4.1: “A lay follower living at home with five qualities is not self-assured.
an5.172:4.3: They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, and use alcohol and drugs that cause negligence.
an5.172:4.4: A lay follower living at home with these five qualities is not self-assured.
an5.172:5.1: A lay follower living at home with these five qualities is self-assured.
an5.172:5.3: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcohol and drugs that cause negligence.
an5.172:5.4: A lay follower living at home with these five qualities is self-assured.”
